    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120627</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120627</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Sila med žicami</string>
            <string language="en">Force between wires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft zwischen Leitungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force entre les fils</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força entre fios</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza fra i legare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη μεταξύ των καλωδίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza entre los alambres</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Medsebojne sile med vodniki po katerih teče tok.</string>
            <string language="en">The forces applied between current carrying wires.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">amperov zakon</string>
            <string language="en">ampere's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vzajemno učinkovanje</string>
            <string language="en">mutual interaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kräfte trafen zwischen aktuellen tragenden 
Leitungen zu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les forces appliquées entre les fils portants 
actuels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As forças aplicaram-se entre fios carregando 
atuais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le forze si sono applicate fra i legare 
trasportanti correnti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι δυνάμεις ίσχυσαν μεταξύ των παρόντων φέρνοντας 
καλωδίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las fuerzas aplicadas entre los alambres que 
llevan actuales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Amperes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gegenseitige Interaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi de l'ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">interaction mutuelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei do ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interação mútua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge dell'ampère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interazione reciproca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νόμος αμπέρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αμοιβαία αλληλεπίδραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ley del amperio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">interacción mutua</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
